name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advent of Code Stars Order by default

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Defaults the AoC leaderboard to 'Stars' ordering

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Friends of mine got competition stress from seeing the local score. Instead, they just want the stars ordering. This plugin just redirects the "bare" leaderboard/view/123456 to leaderboard/view/123456?order=stars so you land on there.
